Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the week's accomplishments.
Set up a final team meeting for the week to discuss accomplishments and next week's focus.
Meet with the entire team to share achievements and any outstanding issues.
Wrap up the week by finalizing any loose ends in the project document.
Send out the summary report to all team members summarizing the week’s progress and expectations for next week.
Log off for the week and check personal websites of interest before leaving.
